snippet.title: Pivotal nabs one of Cloudera’s top talents, Hadoop project founder …
snippet.description:
* Pivotal nabs one of Cloudera’s top talents, Hadoop project founder … and VMware spinoff with a Hadoop distribution that competes with Cloudera. As senior manager of the open-source Hadoop […] with that. But where are all the other bits and pieces? Where’s my developer sort of aspects?” He cited as an example the […] Java application development framework Spring, which Pivotal is sponsoring. “Pivotal is just way better positioned to get
17 weeks ago
